trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>o evento é gerado pelo anfitrião de estruturador para determinadas ações num controlo sobre a superfície do design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a ViewEventArgs object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>é processada por um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar método, que demora um objeto de ViewEventArgs como parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>classe fornece um delegado predefinido para processar <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Substituem os estruturadores de controlo personalizado o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>métodos para processar esses eventos para o controlo da superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a ViewEventArgs object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador inicializa um objeto de ViewEventArgs para o tipo de ação na superfície de desenho e, em seguida, transmite o objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>propriedade representa a região de estruturador do controlo que o evento se aplica.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the ViewEventArgs object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade do objeto ViewEventArgs indica o tipo de ação: - um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>propriedade fornece os argumentos de eventos que são específicos para o tipo de ação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer host initializes ViewEventArgs objects as follows: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object when you click a region.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o anfitrião estruturador inicializa ViewEventArgs objetos da seguinte forma: - um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>Quando clica numa região de objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object when a control is drawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>Quando um controlo é desenhado na superfície de desenho de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object when the template editing mode changes for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>quando o modelo de modo de edição é alterado para o controlo da superfície de desenho de objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre eventos e delegados, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs"></xref> class for the type of view event on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs"> </xref> classe para o tipo de evento de vista a superfície do design.

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs constructor is used by the designer host to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de ViewEventArgs é utilizado pelo anfitrião de estruturador para inicializar uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>do objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The designer host passes the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador transmite o inicializado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>Delegar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Typically, `region` is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, `region` está definido para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>eventos, e `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>

trans-unit.source: The type of action that raised the event; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de ação que o desencadeou o evento; utilizada para inicializar <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType*>

trans-unit.source: The designer region that the action applies to; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>.
trans-unit.target: A região estruturador que se aplica a ação a; utilizada para inicializar <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region*>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments associated with `eventType`; used to initialize the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento associados `eventType`; utilizado para inicializar <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the event arguments that are associated with the action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os argumentos de eventos que estão associados a ação que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The EventArgs property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EventArgs fornece os argumentos de eventos que são específicos para o tipo de ação que é especificado o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you click a region, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event, and then initializes the EventArgs property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando clica numa região, o anfitrião estruturador inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>como um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>evento e, em seguida, inicia a propriedade EventArgs como um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the designer host initializes the EventArgs property with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event, or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o anfitrião estruturador inicializa a propriedade EventArgs com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>do objeto para uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>evento, ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs>do objeto para uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The EventArgs property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de EventArgs é inicializada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An EventArgs that contains additional event data that is specific to the type of event.
trans-unit.target: Um EventArgs que contém dados de evento adicional que são específicos para o tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de ação que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The EventType property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action raised the event: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EventType o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objeto indica o tipo de ação gerado o evento: - um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>propriedade fornece os argumentos de eventos que são específicos para o tipo de ação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EventType property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de EventType é inicializada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent"></xref> that specifies the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent"> </xref> que especifica o tipo de ação que originou o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a região estruturador que o evento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The Region property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de região representa a região de estruturador do controlo que o evento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Region property is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a propriedade de região está definida para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>eventos, e `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>

trans-unit.source: The Region property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de região é inicializada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"></xref> that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion"> </xref> aos quais se aplica a ação.
